message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on the task of image captioning, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a hierarchical attention model and applies deep learning techniques such as CNN and LSTMs, which are common in cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper uses a generative adversarial network (GAN) and reinforcement learning (RL) algorithm, which are also relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
